EmailTemplate.name: RE: Potential work for Michael Leadon (1358206881.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Potential work for Michael Leadon (1358206881.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Standard Template - - Clean Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Long and Michael, So nice to meet you via email, and welcome back to MBO! Please consider me your point of contact and follow the steps below to complete your re-enrollment. - Log in to the MBO site www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Click the Enrollment link once you are logged in - Confirm contact information - Print out I-9 at the end of the enrollment - You will sign/date section 1 and local notary will sign/date section 2 (most people visit their local bank.) Please email or fax back to MBO (we do not need an original copy.) If you use a US passport as supporting documentation I will need an image of it to comply with E-Verify (most people just take a picture with their phone and then email it to me.) - Send me your clients contact information (name, email, phone number) and I will reach out to get a contract in place. - The link to my private page can be found here <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> there are lots of great resources on this page and I encourage you to bookmark it. Please contact me with any questions. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Long Su [mailto:longsu@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, January 11, 2013 7:30 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Michael Leadon Subject: Potential work for Michael Leadon Hi Sara, I am an alumni of MBO since 2005, and have not been active for a while. Recently I talked to Michael Leadon who is also an alumni of MBO and that he has some work for me. I wonder if you can reinstate both of our accounts and also put mine under Michaels business group, so that when he is paid by the client (in an upcoming SOW), he can also pay me for the portion of work I do for him. Ive copied this email to Michael so he can give you more details. Thanks, LongPhone: 909-532-0116MBO Associate ID: 2856
